website_summaries.verdict: Sony's WH-1000XM2 may not be quite as comfortable as Bose's QuietComfort 35 II, but in some respects it's a superior headphone.
pros: The Sony WH-1000XM2 is an excellent-sounding, comfortable wireless headphone with effective noise canceling that measures up to Bose's for muffling ambient noise
Its battery life has been improved and it has some nifty extra features geared toward frequent travelers
cons: It should perform a little better as a headset

customer_reviews.title: There is no manufacturer's warranty, the seller does not respond
customer_reviews.text: When buying it was indicated that 1000xm2 new, but the package did not have a warranty card, I used them for a week after which came a spoiled update from Sony which sony was later canceled, I managed to update and get a brick, now I can not do anything the seller did not answer me I waited a month, I can not go to Sony too, there is no guarantee coupon
customer_reviews.author: Danilov Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the discount
customer_reviews.text: Great price for good as new headphones. It didn’t come in the original box, but it did not seem used or refurbished at all. I love the case, the soft leather, and the sleek look of a touchpad instead of buttons. There is a slight learning curve, but I love these so much now.
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: An excellent set of headphones. Work flawlessly on the long airplane rides and walking around a noisy city environment. I actually put them on sometimes when there is a lot of noise at the house and I want to tune out. Works great. Typical high Sony quality and 2 months in I have not had any issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: ZDM

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with a terrific sound
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones with a terrific sound. I also have the Bose QuietComfort which I like but I was able to purchase the Sony's for less and I feel the sound is just as good maybe even better to me. I find the noise cancelling works extremely well and my S8 and my computer easily finds and connects with them. Would highly recommend these for individuals who want a great set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: edward anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not Hi-Fi, But A Great Traveler's Companion
customer_reviews.text: These things are the bee's knees. I bought them as I own an iPhone 7 and Google Pixel 2 XL, neither of them have headphone jacks, and I travel incessantly for work and needed decent headphones. While active noise cancelling was not a necessity for me, I quite like having it. The sound quality on these doesn't come close to a pair of hi-fi headphones in the same price range (see: Audio Technica or similar), but when you're 36,000 feet in the air, that doesn't matter too much as audiophiles aren't the intended market for this product. As far as battery life goes, I think the estimated 20 hours is bang on. At the refurb price, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived empty of headphones and case. Boo.
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, Amazon started processing a refund immediately upon my call to them. But, I’d have rather had the headphones for my trip. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: Crying Cancelling Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband (refurbished from Amazon) for his birthday and he has raved about them since. He let me borrow them for an international flight that was 11 hours. I wore them to watch movies the entire time. I wore them with my glasses and expected my head to hurt like with other headphones, but it didn’t. What surprised me the most was when I removed them, there was a baby crying on the flight. I asked my husband if the baby had been crying a lot during the flight, he said yes. I never heard the crying lol I am now buying some for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: I've recommended these to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Best gadget I've purchased in years. The noise cancelling, audio quality, and battery life are absolutely outstanding. The sound is a little base heavy, but in a good way and not excessively like Beats. I find the sound to be more lively and interesting than Bose QC headphones too. The touch controls and companion app are nice features, as is the ability to fold the headphones flat in the included hard-case. My only complaint is that the ear cups are a touch small in order to make a good seal, and during long flights I need to adjust them a few times to maintain a nice comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Auto shutdown
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling automatically shuts off after five minutes. This is pointless, as I bought these for noise canceling. I spent 50 minutes on the phone with Amazon and sony Technical Support troubleshooting this issue, they had me reset the unit, the problem persists. While on hold all this time I did some googling and found that this is a known problem with this unit. Sony really needs to get their support together.
customer_reviews.author: SALS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer support from Sony...Bose is much better
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my wife to compare against my Bose QC 35s. I would say both headphones are comparable, but I was shocked to discover that Sony would not offer a replacement AV cord after the supplied one broke within a few uses. On the flip side, Bose has been great to offer replacement parts for an older version of headphones that my brother gave me that were 5-6 years old. For this reason, I have a had time suggesting anyone purchase the Sony headphones if you expect any support from Sony in years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Stopped holding a charge
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were holding less and less of a charge after one month and then stopped holding one altogether at six months.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones. Buy Without Hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought i would spend this much on headphones, but i waited for them to go on sale, and found these certified refurbished. I love them! They came with the audio cord, USB cord, and a case. To me, they look and function as if i bought them new. The fit and function are flawless. I look forward to wearing these while traveling, but for now have been using them in my office to better concentrate on my work with minimal distraction. For anyone out there on the fence about saving a few bucks and buying certified refurbished, do not think twice. They are a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: autocad_junkie

customer_reviews.title: First one didn't work, but sent it back no problem. Love the product I have now.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair had no sound coming from the left ear, but I called customer support and my rep was very lovely and helpful. I was able to get a full refund via Amazon no problem. I'm a casual user (definitely no audiophile), but the quality is definitely a step up from my previous pair of Sony headphones (Sony MDR100ABN/B Headphones). Great detail and lower register in the sound. Controls are easy to figure out. Only qualm with the headphones is that there's no convenient way to stores the wires in the headphone case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these or you'll be addicted for life!!
customer_reviews.text: I could NOT believe the difference these headphones made on a jet flight to Ireland. I arrived less worn out, fresher and more alert. This is in addition to enjoying the in-flight movies because I could totally hear them! On the return trip, I warned my aisle mate from Galway, "Don't try these or you'll have to buy some." You should have seen the look on his face as he kicked in the noise-cancellation. Hooked for life! This technology is awesome, comfortable, and lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Pour Boy

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust third party
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, saddened and embarrassed. This was a very important gifts for my son who is in Grad school. He opens it Christmas morning to find it is defaulted, return has begun. But it ruined my Christmas and hurt me dearly after saving to purchase item. I trusted a third party, lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Ramey

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than bose
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of headphones and always try them out. I'm somewhat of an audiophile. These sound better than bose as far as the lows and the clarity is pretty much on par for the lost part. I like a little more bass which these have. Noise canceling as far as I can tell without trying them side by side is as good as bose. The newer model of these might have a lite bit better noise cancelation but these are certainly very effective. Could hardly hear my dog bark with no music and not at all with music.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Importantly, the microphone works better at ambient sound mode, compare to NC mode.
customer_reviews.text: This Refurbished noise canceling handset is just like new! When turning on the NC mode, the entire world becomes quiet. This headphone can cancel noise up to 3KHz, which is better than the Bose one I have. The volume can be controlled by sliding your finger up or down on the headphone. The headphone comes with a audio cable which can connect it to my computer without using Bluetooth. For a mobile device, bluetooth is a better option. Once fully charged with 4 hours, the headset can last ~10 house using NC mode. Importantly, the microphone works better at ambient sound mode, compare to NC mode.
customer_reviews.author: Feynman

customer_reviews.title: Great noise reduction, but...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these a few weeks now and generally find them satisfactory. The comfort is good, the battery life is excellent, and the materials appear to be of high quality. The noise cancellation works exceptionally well. There are also some nice features available with the companion app. If your main reason for purchase is to use them while flying you'll be pleased. That said, I was shocked by the mediocre sound quality of these headphones in view of their price. I was expecting much better. There is a clear preponderance of mid-bass that muddies up the sound. Even the equalization included in their app can't quite deliver a natural balance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Less than twenty minutes after receiving product, headphones would not charge. Tried everything in manual to fix this, then found out this an extremely common problem, even with new ones. These headphones are garbage. Sony customer service is just as garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Wentner

customer_reviews.title: The music sound quality is great. The ability to adjust the sound level and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd noise cancelation headset purchase. The music sound quality is great. The ability to adjust the sound level and skip to the next or previous song by touching the right ear muff is great. The 30 hour battery life is great. However, I could not give this product 5 stars because they do not block out as much noise as I was hoping for the price. I still hear a little noise around me when music is not playing. I would rate this product 95 out of a perfect 100.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: buy these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot, and end up sharing rooms and cars with people. I am a light sleeper, and get annoyed with other people! (ok - I have issues!). Been looking at these for quite some time and finally got these refurbed. They are STILL the bomb! They TOTALLY silence those annoying hotel air conditioners; and cancel snoring roommates. And I haven't had to listen to meaningless airplane or car chatter in months! Game changer! Buy these! Did ai say that already? Oh - and if you are looking at the Bose...just stop. "No highs, no lows: must be Bose."
customer_reviews.author: Richard Witt

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Unpackaged, an the "refurbished" must mean a f'n simpleton shot hot glue into the USB connection to the point that it would not accept the provided cable. Absolute joke. There could not have been ANY quality control on this. garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paulson

customer_reviews.title: They're ok if you need noise canceling above all.
customer_reviews.text: Good but not for me. Decent sound quality, highs were too much at high volume s and bass seemed to distort at the same time. The amp capped out before I reached highest volume and seemed to have an opposite effect. Touch controls worked well, though they are finicky while adjusting headphones. Sound quality fell off a little when noise canceling was off. Seems like they're trying to make too many different ppl happy. Returned after I got my Sennheiser hd1s +1 to Sennheiser for an all around higher quality product. Couldn't be happier**
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of refurbished headphones, but I couldn't resist how much cheaper these are. Ordered on Monday and the product came by Friday and free shipping too! The headphones came in the original retail box, but without the user manual. The wires were also bounded by just plain rubber bands. The headphones were pretty much BRAND new (they looked perfect with very very minimal blemishes and it smelled new). Headphones paired easily and works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have helped me on over 100 flights this year
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. I primarly use the when I travel for business (90-110 flights per year). I often fly the red eye and these are game changers. 90% of the noise is gone and I have peace. No music neccesary. Adding music or movies elimiate almost all cabin noise. Highly recommend. Mine are "renewed" so they were a bargin as well
customer_reviews.author: bilru

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: These "refurbs" arrived in perfect physical condition, complete with case and cables. The manual is available on this page. They would not pair until I did a factory reset. Therefor I recommend doing that first, then loading the app and doing the firmware update. Ater that you will end up with the best wireless, NC cans that you have eve owned. Go ahead and spend $8 for a SquareTrade 4 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones, but they stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used the headphones very lightly over 3 months, but then they wouldn't power on. The last it indicated was that the battery power was medium, maybe 4 days prior to it not coming on. I plugged in to charge, the red charge indicator came on for maybe 120 seconds, then turned off. Not sure what happened, but I imagine it is due to the fact that they were renewed (not new), and I'm pretty disappointed that I took that gamble. Fantastic headphones when they were operational, though!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wow much better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: I had the Bose Q35, my wife kept bugging me to give them to her and I could but me another pair, not wanting to spend another $350 I looked at the Sony's and found a pair of refurbished ones far less, wow am I glad I got these, hands down better than the Q35. I'm buying up Amazon certified refurbished everything. I'm hooked... Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Absolute scam. Got a box with no headphones just a random sony Bluetooth speaker with a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Harman

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little bit cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Since this was renewed, it could have been a little cheaper, but besides that, it is an amazing item. I would give it 5/5 in all aspects like noise cancellation and battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Matute

customer_reviews.title: came with a defect.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones came with a defect. They are creaking quite loudly whenever I move. Returned. Please check them before you are sending to Customers.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Mint
customer_reviews.text: Came in mint condition. Not a single sign of wear. Repackaged in a way that made it feel as if it was brand new. Very happy and would highly recommend to anyone debating it due to the ‘refurbished’ Condition.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the savings.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical about buying refurbished headphones but these exceeded my expectations completely. The only thing missing was the original box but the contents could have passed as brand new. The headphones are epic but everyone knew that already. Delivery was quick and I've got an extra hundred bucks in my pocket. Stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis D.

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: When i got the refurb edition i was somewhat worried because i hear so many horror stories, but ive read good things and they were all right. these are the best headphones ive ever owned. I wear them at the gym every day, the battery is amazing, the sound quality is top, the app is great, its like im in my own little world with the noise cancellation. I considered buying several other kinds, but im super glad i got these instead.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Really good, pricey
customer_reviews.text: Paired these cans to laptop and to tablet; sound quality is very good for bluetooth cans. Battery life very good. Useful features like on-earpiece volume control, ability to switch to external pickup, so don't need to remove them to talk w/ someone. Expensive, but worth it, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but depends how you want to use it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a set of Bose I left on an airplane. Very different experience. I don't like that you can't just wear the headphones to block airplane noise, without connecting to a phone or the plane's entertainment system, like with the Bose. If you try, a voice comes on and interrupts your sleep to inform you that it's shutting down. Ugh. Totes the opposite of what's intended. Otherwise, seems comparable to the Bose in quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Hebenstreit

customer_reviews.title: Bought a broken item.
customer_reviews.text: Certified refurbished my ass. Couldnt even charge the headphones. You would think they would test that if it really was certified refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: jake nelson

customer_reviews.title: These things are THE best of ALL the BT models and I've tried them ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe ANYONE leaving a review on these would say something negative! These things are THE best of ALL the BT models and I've tried them all -- Bose, Sennheiser, etc. If you are complaining about anything on these then you are just simply one of those who thrives on complaining. Way better than the Bose. Had them; over-rated. Sound wasn't as good. If you are on the fence, just order. I'm certain you won't regret
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: SQ better than Bose QC35.
customer_reviews.text: .ANC is pretty impressive. I bought it for my son who is now doing a lot of air travel right now. He says these headphones changed his life. I own some pretty good headphones, and tried 1000XM2 keeping them on my head for like full two days. SQ better than Bose QC35. Ear cups could be a touch bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great product, take note of sellers when buying refurb
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is, as per expectations, great. It does look quite big on your head though and I trigger the muting feature by accident at times when I tilt my head and the right earcup touches my shoulder (not a deal-breaker at all). However, I did go for the refurbished option and the initial product I received was damaged so had to be returned. The return process was smooth so not a big issue. I then reordered (again refurbished) from a different seller this time (secondipity) and I received the product as expected. It appeared to be unused when I got it so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The look is great, it has controls on the area of the ears that are touch activated (which I love) and the quality of sound is wonderful. Worth every penny! I use these also for recording music, and use the chord that comes with it so that I don't have any echo'ing. works great!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lighter color and they performed well on my European and in states flights. I was concerned because they are refurbished, but haven't had any issues yet. The perform very well and I am pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love the minimal buttons on this headset. The headphone App for the headset is the best feature of this headset. The sound this thing produces over Bluetooth is just amazing. It will make you forget you can still connect it using the 3.5mm for an even more mind-shattering sound quality. The battery life for me is over 1 month depending on Usage. Regular commuters will go a whole week without charging. Best noise cancellation out there. Period!!
customer_reviews.author: B-Cube

customer_reviews.title: You can't purchase a better refurbished headphone!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the brand new XM3, which just came out this month, there simply isn't a better headphone on the market. Fell free to read reviews here, or on youtube, but you are bound to reach the same conclusion. There is a bit of a learning curve here as they use touch controls but that is really it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and have made my train commute so much more enjoyable***** 4 months later the headphones stopped working. Conveniently just outside the warranty timeframe. Originally gave 5 stars due to the headphones working fine but now after 4 months and light use they won't turn on or even charge due to no fault of my own and Secondipity told me to take a hike. Do not buy from this business.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: 1000XM2
customer_reviews.text: Since the 1000XM3 came out, this is somewhat worth to buy. The build quality, sound quality, the touch control, nice noise-canceling, everything is nice. I love SONY's product
customer_reviews.author: Xie Xiaoyang

customer_reviews.title: Better SQ Than Bose, Costs Less, Noise Cancellation is Great
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work has the Bose versions and made fun of me for getting the Sonys. And yet mine work just as well and have better sound quality...
customer_reviews.author: wildcatgoal

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones in every sense
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound cancelling. By far much better than the Sony $30 noise cancelling ear[hones. Even better refurbished at $200. But to go to sleep with Audiobooks earbuds are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GGS Engineering

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is horrible. Not good for calls or voip at all.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones will make you sound like you are speaking into a tin can on a windy day. I'm not sure why with all the technology to help cancel noise for the listener, that Sony didn't use the same technology to help the person that you are talking to hear you speak. I just don't get it. These have been sent back. Search "sony wh-1000xm2 microphone quality" before buying if this feature is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Loeffel

customer_reviews.title: Righteous sound for a Bluetooth over ear not beats or Bose or b and o.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome on every level. As of 4/2020 they’re now the older model and refurbs should be cheaper.....had mine for yr or more now and there almost as good as a wired ath50 or 50x from audio technica.
customer_reviews.author: G. Man

customer_reviews.title: Lasted four months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my nephew. They worked well for four months, then they stopped. The company will not replace them or refund after 30 days. So, 200 dollars for four months of use, comes to 50 dollars a month. A disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best!!! Battery lasts long!!! Perfect crisp sound..and Bluetooth!!!! Love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bootlover

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wireless headphones,great build and design. Superior sound quality,great noise cancelling technology. This headphones worth every penny. I would definitely recommend this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: A.Grigoryan

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I can really add anything that has not already been said about these headphones. The sound and ANC is unrivaled and the battery life is fantastic. Although these were refurbished I could not tell, they were in flawless condition when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: buffdaddy

customer_reviews.title: NOT accurately represented, buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones but we’re misrepresented as refurbished when they were just used.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Kind of creaky
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Kind of creaky. Not the most solid build quality but I knew what I was getting. The sound and noise cancellation more than makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Fab noise cancellation!  Sanity saver!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a sanity saver at work. Best investment in my mental health ever! Phenomenal noise cancellation with decent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 1,5 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am no longer able to charge and it's only possible to use it wired without noise cancellation. Unfortunately again, there is no replacement parts and the sony repair centers told me it's not possible to fix and proposed me to responsibly discard it because of the battery. Unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Rafael M.

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy but sound great
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a bit on the heavy side but they sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ZG

customer_reviews.title: Original product but bad accessory
customer_reviews.text: I rated this product with two stars because they not including the original accessories with it . The micro usb cable is medium quality and does not as level of Sony production as well as the volatile converter. There are also there’s no instructions for the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: You don’t even know your office or the plane are so LOUD until you take these off
customer_reviews.author: Grace K.

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I use these things everywhere. Grocery shopping, commutes, airplane, studying. They are great and the noise cancellation works brilliantly without losing audio fidelity. They could be a little more comfortable (they start to hurt my head after about 3-4 hours of straight use). Also the plastic makes creaky sounds, but has never cracked or deformed.
customer_reviews.author: Raza Qadri

customer_reviews.title: you wont regret.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift , he ABSOLUTELY loves it, i own bose speakers ( which look better ) but when we compared Sony was slightly better than Bose ( features and sound quality )
customer_reviews.author: Jabakar Santhosam

customer_reviews.title: The sound was good, but if you have large ears or sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound was good, but if you have large ears or sensitive ears (like me), then these will cause problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing sound quality. Construction is great. A few people have complained about comfort over a long period of time, but I wear these when I code for hours(up to 9 a day) and have never had comfort problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for sound. The only con is that it automatically changes the NC/Ambient on it's on and interrupts my listening.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The sound isolation is very good.
customer_reviews.text: 1st time with Bluetooth headphones. Terrific performance; I can wander room to room and still keep connection. Good sound too. Better than my old MDR V-600. Squeeky ear pads are annoying.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Great for airplane passengers.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for airline travel and was finally able to watch a movie or really enjoy the music. It cut out the airplane him and most of the general background noise so I can really hear what I want. This also lets me nap on the plane, whereas before I could never really fall asleep because of the distracting noise.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene W.

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable for trains, planes, and automobiles.
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my daily commute, on flights, or while at work. Great battery life and very comfortable for extended use. The sound is crisp and clear for music or podcasts. Noise cancelling is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Mandrake

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones but...
customer_reviews.text: These were refurbs and although they sounded great didn't come with a case or anything else. The price for what you get is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Eckhart

customer_reviews.title: Great premium headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'd say that these headphones are wonderful if you would like to hear a more rich and beautiful sound while not damaging your ears with a loud volume. The noise canceling feature really helps with being able to listen to music at a low level but retain the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don’t board an airplane without your Sony headset!
customer_reviews.text: The headband is a little too tight at times, causing my ears to become sweaty. Music sounds awesome. The greatest on an airplane. Headset blocks out all engine roar along with most of surrounding noises.
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best headphone purchase I have made. Sound quality is great and noise canceling is excellent. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They last extremely long and my husband can't hear me or at least he pretends not too, lol
customer_reviews.author: M. B

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT STRESS HOW AMAZING THESE ARE. SOUND QUALITY IS EXCELLENT AND NOISE CANCELLING IS EXCELLENT. I like having my friends try them and watching their faces when the sound cancelling kicks in. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Williams

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally review items
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best purchase I've made in a long time. As an engineer that works in a rather noisy office, these have been perfect for keeping the focus. Would 100% recommend any version of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, terrible for phone calls.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound quality of these for listening to music or podcasts, but the microphone was terrible for making phone calls. In 4 days off use I had enough people say they couldn't hear me that I returned the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: CJE

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a quiet flight.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect on the plane. Comfortable for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective and bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Item was received defective, sound only came out from one ear. Also sound quality is awful. This was a gift For someone and ruined the experience. I do not recommend this seller or this item.
customer_reviews.author: tariq abu-sultaneh

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it! Have only charged it once or twice and i use it everyday at the gym. Literally love the app, the headphones themselves. A bit on the large side but honestly it’s super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: maries2cute

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! My earballs are surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These really are as good as everyone else said. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: ryssee

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, they work great!
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling feature is amazing. The sound quality, and comfort is great. I bought the headset to use on a long flight, and it performed perfectly. Nice case too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, slightly less than Bose QC 35 ii
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these and ended up returning. The headphones had extreme cosmetic wear and tear. The sound quality was good and the features of the headphones were creative. I ended up returning these for Bose QC 35ii for the following reasons:. Bose headphones much more comfortable ear pads, the noise cancelling was better and the customer service of Bose is unmatched. Period.
customer_reviews.author: AW33

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable isolation
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and noise cancelling. Fantastic battery life. Ambient sound while listen is great while waiting on announcements. Have not be able to update mine.
customer_reviews.author: Dredwes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, love the ambient functionality. Very happy with these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke after 4 months of use , I was taking good care of it and it still broke . Don’t buy it it’s worthless
customer_reviews.author: Ten

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 3-weeks
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was great; however, stopped charging after three weeks. Fortunately for me it happed within the 30-day return period.
customer_reviews.author: Katie J Lake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and noise cancelling! My only issue is they are easy to fall off the ears when in a laying position for bench press (incline/neutral/decline). Other than that, these headphones are great!
customer_reviews.author: dusch_07

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This extraordinary headset is now with me on every trip. Work extremely well and i love the sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones came in what I could tell to be “Brand New”. They work great and the Features that have are very useful. The NC feature will make you have to yawn quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling feature makes me feel like my ears are being violated!
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Best NC headphones I have ever had! Comfortable, great sound, and an even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Kira Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Great product, light weights
customer_reviews.text: Love the noise cancelling, sound is great as well. Glad I found them refurbished and saved a third off of new.
customer_reviews.author: Erin N. Coker

customer_reviews.title: Failing from the first moment. Vibration noise on left speaker
customer_reviews.text: I noticed it was failing the moment I got it. I have been traveling for 3 months and I couldn't sen it back and now I can't return the item. Amazon gave me back some money but not the fix.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Merchante Ruiz-Mateos

customer_reviews.title: These are very good sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: They came early and the product arrived in a retail box and looks new. These are very good sounding headphones, sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: wonderful headphones, great noise canceling capabilities and great sound- bass especially. looking back, would probably recommend the bose quiet comforts over these though
customer_reviews.author: Jesse vanston

customer_reviews.title: Sound only from left side when connected to Apple computer
customer_reviews.text: The sound and noise cancelling is good, but it is terribly annoying that sound only comes from the left when connected to the mac computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Product incomplete
customer_reviews.text: No case . No instructions. No 110 adapter. ALL GOING BACK!!
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound and the features, so far. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeni K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Got what I bought that is a nice pair of headphones which had been refurbished. Could not see that on the headphones though only on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony WH-1000XM2/B Wireless Bluetooth Noise Cancelling Hi-Fi Headphones (Renewed)
product_meta.description:
Style:BLACKThis Certified Refurbished product is manufacturer refurbished, shows limited or no wear, and includes all original accessories plus a 90-day limited hardware warranty.
Smart Listening feature automatically adjusts to your surroundings and activities
Quick Attention Mode for effortless conversations without taking your headphones off
Touch Sensors to play and skip tracks, control volume by a simple tap or swipe on the right ear cup
Battery life up to 30hrs (with wireless noise cancelling)
feature_bullets: Smart Listening automatically detects your activity, whether you're travelling in an airport or sitting in a quiet area, then balances the noise cancelling levels accordingly. You can customize your preferences with the Sony I Headphones Connect App.

Leave your headphones on: Place your hand over the right ear cup to turn the volume down for instant conversation.Change the track, turn the volume up or down, and take or make calls by tapping or swiping the panel with your fingertip.
Keep the music playing with up to 30 hours of battery life and quick charging, for up to 70 minutes of play after just 10 minutes of charging.
Hear music that stays true to the original recording with Hi-Res Audio. Optimized for Hi-Res Audio, S-Master HX reduces distortion and allows you to enjoy all the subtleties in your music.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
